review_title: It's too tall. Floppy at the top. It's ...
reviews: It's too tall. Floppy at the top. It's just not my style. Otherwise it's well made, warm and the one I received is made in Canada. I just cannot wear it though.

The lights are small, but they are nice and bright. They all worked fine. The only problem is the shipping time. The items were sent out quickly and arrived in Canada in about 2 weeks, but then the tracking stopped. The estimated delivery time was another 2 to 4 weeks at that point. The lights were delivered to me in Toronto a full 2 months after they arrived in Canada.

It's well made, looks great and the metal lock seems sturdy. I bought the unpainted wallet. On the downside, the capacity is not great ... 7 cards and 5 bills ... you can put a bit more, but it will stress the lock. Also, it's kind of expensive for what it is. And, if you carry it in your pocket with coins, the wallet gets these ugly black scuff marks on it. I polished the marks off fairly easily, and now my wallet always gets a pocket all to itself.
I like the cap part, but I worry that the connection between the two pieces will break easily. I don't think I will use the part for connecting the charging adapter to the power cord.

I really like this table. If you assemble it correctly, it is pretty sturdy. It did take me and another person like 3 hours to assemble it though. The instructions are OK, but I would recommend taking your time, reading the instructions carefully, and looking at the diagrams very carefully as you go.
